mapper.sql: flag, title, content, first_picture, recommend, share_statement, appreciation , commentabled, create_time, tag_ids, type_id
mapper.select: select * from t_blog b,t_type p where b.type_id = p.id and b.id = #{id}

select b.id, b.first_picture, b.flag, b.title, b.content, b.views, b.update_time,b.commentabled, b.share_statement, b.appreciation, u.nickname, u.avatar, tag.id tagid, tag.name tagname from t_blog b, t_user u, t_tag tag, t_blog_tags tb where b.user_id = u.id and tb.blog_id = b.id and tb.tag_id = tag.id and b.id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM t_blog b, t_type p, t_user u WHERE b.type_id = p.id AND b.user_id = u.id ORDER BY b.update_time ASC
SELECT * FROM t_blog b, t_type p, t_user u WHERE b.type_id = p.id AND b.user_id = u.id ORDER BY b.update_time DESC

SELECT * FROM t_blog b, t_type p, t_user u WHERE b.type_id = p.id AND b.user_id = u.id
and ( title like concat('%',#{query},'%') or description like concat('%',#{query},'%'))
ORDER BY b.update_time DESC

select b.id, b.title, b.update_time, b.recommend, b.published, b.type_id, t.id, t.name from t_blog b ,t_type t where b.type_id = t.id
and title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
and b.type_id = #{typeId} /*根据博客类型查询*/
and b.recommend = #{recommend} /*根据博客推荐查询*/
mapper.insert: insert into t_blog (title, content, first_picture, flag, views, appreciation, share_statement, commentabled,published, recommend, create_time, update_time, type_id, tag_ids, user_id, description) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{firstPicture}, #{flag}, #{views}, #{appreciation}, #{shareStatement}, #{commentabled}, #{published}, #{recommend}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{typeId}, #{tagIds}, #{userId}, #{description});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_blog ORDER BY views DESC LIMIT 0, 6

select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, t.name typename, t.id typeid, u.nickname, u.avatar from t_blog b, t_type t, t_user u where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id and b.type_id = #{typeId} order by b.update_time desc

select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, t.name typename, t.id typeid, t1.name tagname, t1.id tagid, u.nickname, u.avatar from t_blog b, t_type t, t_user u, t_blog_tags tb, t_tag t1 where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id and tb.blog_id = b.id and tb.tag_id = t1.id and t1.id = #{tagId} order by b.update_time desc
select DATE_FORMAT(b.update_time, '%Y') from t_blog b order by b.update_time desc
